Title: Absent Speaker
Description:
It is a dark day for the Ringing Deeps, $p.

I always knew there was something about the High Speaker that wasn't quite right. Now we have proof.

And we need justice. If he has plans for the Awakening Machine, then we've got to stop him.
ObjectivesText: Meet Speaker Brinthe in the Earthenworks.
RewardText: The High Speaker and his followers will answer for their crimes.
